sourcesContent:
<template>{{ text }}</template>

<script lang="ts">
import dataCenter from '@/dataCenter';
import { formatMoney } from '@/utils/currency';
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

export default defineComponent({
  props: {
    value: {
      type: Number,
    },
    currency: {
      type: Number,
    },
  },
  computed: {
    text() {
      if (this.currency) {
        const currency = dataCenter.webConfig.currencyMap[this.currency];
        return formatMoney(this.value, currency);
      } else {
        const currency = dataCenter.wallet.getSelectedCurrency();
        return formatMoney(this.value, currency);
      }
    },
  },
});
</script>

<style>
</style>
